verses.verse: When <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5394>it<s%>, and shall cast out <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2850>thee<s%>, the Hittite, and the <S%H1622>Girgashite<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> and mightier than <S%H6099>thou<s%>;

and when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them up <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5221>thee<s%>, and thou shalt smite <S%H2763>them<s%>; then thou shalt utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H3772>them<s%>: thou shalt make no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H2603>them<s%>, nor show mercy unto them;

neither shalt thou make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with <S%H1323>them<s%>; thy daughter thou shalt not <S%H5414>give<s%> unto his <S%H1121>son<s%>, nor his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> unto thy <S%H1121>son<s%>.

For he will turn <S%H5493>away<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H5647>me<s%>, that they may serve <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: so will the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8045>you<s%>, and he will destroy thee <S%H4118>quickly<s%>.

But thus shall ye <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H7665>them<s%>: ye shall break down their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, and <S%H7665>dash<s%> in pieces their <S%H4676>pillars<s%>, and hew <S%H1438>down<s%> their <S%H842>Asherim<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their graven <S%H6456>images<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

For thou art a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> for his own <S%H5459>possession<s%>, above all <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> did not set his <S%H2836>love<s%> upon <S%H977>you<s%>, nor choose <S%H7230>you<s%>, because ye were more in number than any <S%H5971>people<s%>; for ye were the <S%H4592>fewest<s%> of all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>:

but because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> loveth <S%H8104>you<s%>, and because he would keep the <S%H7621>oath<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>, from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, he is <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, who <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> with them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>,

and <S%H7999>repayeth<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him to their <S%H6440>face<s%>, to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H309>them<s%>: he will not be slack to him that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H7999>him<s%>, he will repay him to his <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Thou shalt therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to do <S%H6213>them<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H6118>pass<s%>, because ye <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to these <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, that Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> with thee the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>:

and he will <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H1288>thee<s%>, and bless <S%H7235>thee<s%>, and multiply <S%H1288>thee<s%>; he will also bless the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, thy <S%H1715>grain<s%> and thy new <S%H8492>wine<s%> and thine <S%H3323>oil<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>cattle<s%> and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> above all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>: there shall not be <S%H6135>male<s%> or female <S%H6135>barren<s%> among <S%H929>you<s%>, or among your cattle.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will take <S%H5493>away<s%> from thee all <S%H2483>sickness<s%>; and none of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>, will he <S%H7760>put<s%> upon <S%H5414>thee<s%>, but will lay them upon all them that hate <S%H8130>thee<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H398>consume<s%> all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> unto <S%H5869>thee<s%>; thine eye shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H5647>them<s%>: neither shalt thou serve their <S%H430>gods<s%>; for that will be a snare unto <S%H4170>thee<s%>.
If thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, These <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> than <S%H349>I<s%>; how <S%H3201>can<s%> I dispossess <S%H3423>them<s%>?

thou shalt not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H2142>them<s%>: thou shalt well <S%H2142>remember<s%> what <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and unto all <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>trials<s%> which thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and the <S%H226>signs<s%>, and the <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and the <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, whereby <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%>: so shall <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of whom thou art <S%H3373>afraid<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> among <S%H7604>them<s%>, until they that are left, and <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H6>themselves<s%>, perish from before <S%H6440>thee<s%>.

Thou shalt not be <S%H6206>affrighted<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>; for Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H1419>thee<s%>, a great <S%H410>God<s%> and a <S%H3372>terrible<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will cast <S%H5394>out<s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee by <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little<s%>: thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> not <S%H3615>consume<s%> them at <S%H4118>once<s%>, lest the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> increase upon <S%H7235>thee<s%>.

But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them up before <S%H6440>thee<s%>, and will <S%H1949>discomfit<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>discomfiture<s%>, until they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>.

And he will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and thou shalt make their <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H6>perish<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: there shall no <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8045>thee<s%>, until thou have destroyed them.

The graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall ye <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: thou shalt not <S%H2530>covet<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> or the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that is on <S%H3947>them<s%>, nor take it unto <S%H3369>thee<s%>, lest thou be snared <S%H8441>therein<s%>; for it is an abomination to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

And thou shalt not <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> into thy <S%H1004>house<s%>, and become a devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%> like unto <S%H8262>it<s%>: thou shalt utterly <S%H8262>detest<s%> <S%H8581>it<s%>, and thou shalt utterly <S%H8581>abhor<s%> <S%H2764>it<s%>; for it is a devoted thing.
